resources.string: Construct a secure password, that will be used to encrypt all your passwords:
Do you want to delete this password?
We created a password for you with which your passwords in your Google Drive will be encrypted: %s. Please note it down so that you can get access to your drive passwords from everywhere!
Please enter the password with which your passwords in Google Drive are encrypted:
This is not the correct drive password. Do you want to delete all your online saved passwords in order to get a new drive password?
By continuing you will delete all passwords saved in your Google Drive. If you are sure please enter \'CONFIRM\':
An error occurred while synchronizing with Google Drive. Please try again, search the internet on Google status code %s or contact us(contact@finnik.de).
An error occurred while disconnecting from drive
Please enter main password to continue
Please enter your new master password again:
This password is too weak. Please choose a safer one

Welcome to PassVault!\n\nWe are happy that you have found the way here and wish you a lot of fun with the password manager. The following pages will teach you the basic functions of the app and if you have any further questions, please contact us at contact@finnik.de

Your first task will be to come up with a strong master password. With this password all your passwords will be encrypted later. So make sure your password is strong enough: PassVault will help you estimate the strength of your password!

This is the home page of PassVault.\nHere you can save passwords: Either you enter a password or you let yourself generate one! You can then save more information about the password, such as e.g the website where you use the password, or the email address that belongs to the password. After saving, the password is automatically copied to your clipboard so that you can continue to use it directly.

On this page you can manage your saved passwords! Here you can search for passwords by entering keywords into the search box e. g. the page stored together with the password. If you have found the correct password, you can copy it directly to your clipboard by clicking on it, so that you can then use it directly. More options will open when you hold down the password box. In the dialog that opens, you can display the password, edit it, or even delete it.

If you want to synchronize your passwords across multiple devices, you can do so via Google Drive. To set up synchronization, press the Drive logo later and log in with your Google account. If you\'ve already connected your Google Account to PassVault, you\'ll now need to enter the password used to encrypt passwords on Google Drive. The first time you associate PassVault with Google Drive, a password is generated to encrypt the passwords on Google Drive.
